data.title: Tree House Brewing Company
data.meta_description: Tree House Brewing Company, brewers of Julius and pioneers of hazy IPA, produce world-renowned beer in Charlton, Massachusetts, with locations in Deerfield, Sandwich, Tewksbury, and Woodstock, Connecticut.

A one-of-a-kind place for live music performances

Tree House Summer Stage

Tree House Brewing Company hosts live touring acts in both our Deerfield and Charlton locations.

In Charlton, we have an incredible pavilion with a scenic wooden backdrop and in Deerfield we host our full size summer stage and House theater which is acoustically designed for premium audio.

Questions? Check our FAQ - If you still have questions, try @twitter first or email.

‚ÄúGreat beverages can transform ordinary moments into extraordinary ones. They can act as time machines with familiar flavors that bridge the present with the past and evoke feelings of nostalgia and a yearning for days gone by. Having fallen in love with this power, we are forever energized to explore the limits of creativity and to work tirelessly to get it right for you every single time.‚Äù

House-sourced. House-roasted.

Tree House Coffee Roastery

We make each product that we serve from start to finish, our way, without compromises. This attention to detail results in beverages that are refined and delightful, each and every time. #housemade
